contexts.context: ...Canton are residence cantons for commoners and paupers. The Temple <mark>charges</mark> very reasonable rents for comfortable workshops, shops, and apartments...
...distances with heavy packs, and to advance and maneuver, <mark>charge</mark> and retreat on the field of battle.
...off the effects of frost, poison, fire, and <mark>charges</mark> of lightning, pulling the pain into a reservoir of magicka...
